meanings.definition: A polymer consisting of sugars and amino acids, forming a major component of bacterial cell walls.
meanings.sent1: The peptidoglycan provides strength to the bacterial cell walls.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study peptidoglycan to understand how bacteria build their protective layers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous bacteria played hide-and-seek behind the peptidoglycan wall.
meanings.sent4: The peptidoglycan shield around the bacteria was like a fortress protecting them.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the intricate structure of peptidoglycan was revealed.
